title: Lemon Garlic Hummus
directions: Combine garbanzo beans, lemon juice, olive oil, tahini, garlic, and salt in a food processor and pulse several times to mix. Process until hummus is smooth, about 1 minute.
ingredients: 2 cups garbanzo beans (chickpeas), rinsed and drained
¼ cup olive oil, or more to taste
4 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste
